title: [OffTopic] Anyone in like home/Mahatma Gandhi pg near pes rr campus
content: I am joining pg soon as soon as college starts (am a fresher in pes). If anyone is already staying there could you give some reviews or tips etc

comments.body: Stayed  there for around 2 years It's good for two sharing and lunch will not be provided. Can DM for further details.

- Food is so so
- 2 meals a day (no lunch Monday through Saturday and no dinner on Sundays)
- Chicken is served on Wednesdays 
- Pretty good maintenance
